Question ID 549 – Gender pay gap; collective wage agreements
Release date
November 2024
Question asked
May non-exempt employees of an employer who are bound by a collective wage agreement be
omitted when calculating the gender pay gap (at least when broken down by employee category)?
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 232 of 278
